content: अनुवर्तनं {@--1@} Following(<ab>fig.</ab> also); attending, compliance, obedience, conformity; प्रकृतस्यानुवर्तने <ls>Ak.</ls>; इदमाश्चर्यमथवा लोकस्थित्यनुवर्तनं <ls>Mv. 7. 4</ls>; दाक्षिण्य° <ls>Dk. 161.</ls> {@--2@} Gratifying, obliging. {@--3@} Approval of, concurrence in. {@--4@} Continuance; result, consequence. {@--5@} Supplying from a preceding Sūtra.
